
## Top Participating Countries {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

In comparison to FP7, Switzerland lost two positions among the top participating countries in terms of total EU contributions obtained under H2020. Its delayed association to H2020 resulted in a 0.8 p.p. decrease from FP7 (4.2%) to H2020 (3.4%). By contrast, the total EU contributions to Belgium increased by 0.8 p.p in relative terms, from 4.1% under FP7 to 4.9% under H2020.  In relative terms, Spain was the country that profited the most with H2020 thanks to a 2.2 p.p. increase, from 7.2% under FP7 9.4% to under H2020.
